title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The power of controlling your own destiny is irresistible now. The soothing trine between the talkative Gemini Moon and agreeable Mercury in your 10th House of Profession bodes well for you to reveal your emotions in a clear yet congenial manner. Treat yourself to something that helps you look professional on the job, like a new suit or a sleek laptop. Your calm self-assurance makes almost any request seem perfectly acceptable today, prompting others to notice and jump to offer whatever assistance you need. Confidence starts within. Mark Twain said, A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
